sentences.english: And he gave her the upper springs, and the nether springs.
sentences.chinese: 她父親就把上泉下泉賜給她。

sentences.english: The water then flows out of the side of the valley to form a spring.
sentences.chinese: 然後，水從山谷坡上流出，形成泉。

sentences.english: The amount of charges on Lightwell has been increased to 10.
sentences.chinese: 光明泉的使用次數被增加到10次。

sentences.english: Roses shave thorns, and silver fountains mud;

sentences.english: I took a deep breath, gazed up at the sky and turned to Izumi.
sentences.chinese: 我深深地吸了一口氣，凝視了一下天空，然後轉向泉。

sentences.english: Izumi and I had a strictly compartmentalised yet totally intimate relationship.
sentences.chinese: 泉和我保持着一種涇渭分明卻又親密無間的關係。

sentences.english: A fountain of gardens, a well of living waters , and streams from Lebanon.

sentences.english: If the roof drops beads, drops deep pool ding-dong sound, it is called "supernatural spring."
sentences.chinese: 洞頂水滴若珠，滴入深池叮咚作響，名曰“靈異泉”。

sentences.english: So Caleb gave her the upper springs and the lower springs.
sentences.chinese: 迦勒就把上泉下泉賜給她。

sentences.english: After that, the spring on Nine Dragon Hill became officially the Second Spring Under Heaven.
sentences.chinese: 從此，九龍山泉水，便定爲“天下第二泉”。

sentences.english: Stephen is the snow to drink, eat their own species of rice and vegetables.
sentences.chinese: 喝的是雪花泉，喫的是大米飯和自家種的青菜。

sentences.english: While the springs to the stream of Daming Lake, nature also become more and more beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 而衆泉歸流的大明湖，自然也愈發的美麗了。

sentences.english: Trees are thriving and vigorous, while springs flow murmuring and look marvelous.

sentences.english: At that time, the merchants gathered Luoquan, Masiran mule called, bustling .
